sense.def:
To climb something
pomeni pomikati se proti vrhu nečesa, na primer drevesa, gore ali lestve.

seg.quote: We started to climb the hill.
We climbed to the top of the mountain.
We were still out of breath from the climb.

sense.def:
To climb somewhere
pomeni previdno in pogosto nerodno se pomikati nekam, največkrat zato, ker ni dovolj prostora.

seg.quote: Four men climbed down through the hatch.

sense.def:
To climb
pomeni tudi pomikati se navzgor ali povečati raven ali vrednost nečesa.

seg.quote: The plane climbed steeply and banked.
The cost has climbed to a staggering £35 billion.
